CustomField.inlineHelpText: For number fields, the overall number of digits permitted, on both sides of the decimal place. For example, Number(4,2), Number(3,3), and Number(6,0) all have a Precision of 6. Note that another common definition of Precision is the numebr of digits to the left of the decimal place, but this is not what Salesforce returns.
CustomField.label: Precision
